Description: Camouflaged or hiding to spring a trap.
Picking through a wreck, corpse, or ruin for loot.
Locked in combat with a Third Party (Roll Table 2 again).
Protecting a location, object, or VIP.
Stuck in terrain, a trap, or a magical anomaly.
Moving from Point A to B (has momentum).
Performing a ceremony or complex technical repair.
Camped sleeping or eating (Low alert).
Running away from something bigger (Roll Table 2 again).
Arguing or trading with another group.
Mid-mutation, molting, or powering up (Phase change).
Actively searching for the Players (Bounty/Food).
Drinking dancing or observing a holiday (Shadow Week).
Mortally wounded or sick; desperation logic applies.
Constructing a fort, bridge, or nest.
Walking a set perimeter; highly alert.
In the process of stealing something or breaking in.
An elder teaching a younger group (Training/Drill).
Disoriented by Chaos or bad maps; erratic behavior.
In stasis or supernatural slumber (waking them is bad).
